test_coverage.notes: 15 new tests covering all acceptance criteria: default priority, validation, to_dict/from_dict, set_priority method

code_quality.notes: Clean implementation following existing patterns, proper validation with clear error messages, ruff passes

minimal_changes.notes: Minimal changes to todo.py: added priority field, validation in __post_init__, set_priority method, and from_dict handling

acceptance_criteria.notes: All acceptance criteria met: optional priority with default 2, invalid raises ValueError, to_dict includes priority, from_dict reads with default 2

backward_compatibility.notes: from_dict defaults priority to 2 for backward compatibility with existing data files
